attributes.action: End the restrictions on the hospitality industry
attributes.additional_details: With immediate effect lift the crippling restrictions on the hospitality industry and let us get back to work. We have enough common sense to keep our customers safe without government interference based on unfounded advice.
attributes.background: End the restrictions on the hospitality industry, as the chief scientific advisor has admitted that there is no evidence that closing hospitality venues helped slow the spread of covid 19.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Remove household mixing restrictions and 10pm curfew for hospitality sector
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555671
